Description: IPTI (IP Threat Intelligence) aggregates IP reputation data from multiple trusted sources including VirusTotal, AbuseIPDB, AlienVault, and ThreatBook, overcoming the limitations of relying on a single provider. It enriches analysis with open port detection, server metadata, privacy indicators, and PTR record evaluation, synthesizing everything into a comprehensive risk-based scoring system. Designed for security engineers performing network access control and threat validation during IP whitelisting and third-party integration workflows.
